title: Delivery Starts With a Complete Address. Poster for IBM
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on brown wove paper
description: Against a brown background intended to simulate interoffice mailing envelopes, black outlines suggest edges, outlines and string fastners creating a tromp-l'oeil effect. Also in black, upper right corner: Delivery / starts / with a / complete / address: And in black lower right reads, Indicate: / Name / Department / Building / Location and at left on edge IBM ans Internal Mail
name: Poster
